front.title: Representation of Uncertainty and Confidence in the Presence Information Data Format Location Object (PIDF-LO)

abstract.t: This document defines key concepts of uncertainty and confidence as they pertain to location information. Methods for the manipulation of location estimates that include uncertainty information are outlined.</t><t> This document normatively updates the definition of location information representations defined in RFCs 4119 and 5491. It also deprecates related terminology defined in RFC 3693.
